data.name: Defiance Season Pass
data.detailed_description:
Save 20% on all 5 DLC packs with our Season 1 bundle!

Unlock the Castithan playable race, new weapons and vehicles, missions, and rewards, plus a bonus Hellbug Combat Cap and Lock Box. This is the complete package for the true ark hunter!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP2
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.0 GHz CPU or better
  • Memory: 2 GB System RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB video card (NVIDIA GeForce 8600, ATI Radeon HD 2900, or Intel HD 4000 integrated graphics or better)
  • DirectX®: 9.0c
  • Hard Drive: 15 GB free hard drive space
  • Sound: DirectX 8.1 compatible sound card
  • Internet: Broadband internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.4 GHz CPU or better
  • Memory: 4 GB System RAM
  • Graphics: 1024MB video card (NVIDIA GeForce GTS 250 or ATI Radeon HD 4750 or better)
  • DirectX®: 9.0c
  • Hard Drive: 15 GB free hard drive space
  • Sound: DirectX 8.1 compatible sound card
  • Internet: Broadband internet connection
